The history of the European Union out of Intel was the bigge

By (Xinhua Zhang) of the European Union yesterday gave the history of Intel's largest ticket --- 1.06 billion euros (about 1.45 billion U.S. dollars), this amount more than the Tank Francaise Microsoft monopoly case against Microsoft in the European Union imposed a 497 million euros fine. The penalty was due to Intel to monopolize the market, trying to block in the AMD market.
The European Commission said Intel to Acer, Dell, HP, Lenovo, and NEC to offer discounts and other computer manufacturers to require these companies to buy from all or most of Intel X86CPU, to pay these companies to postpone or cancel the Tank Louis launch of AMD-based chips Model. In addition, Intel from 2002 to 2007 to Germany's largest e-retailers to pay MediaSaturnHolding allow the retailer to buy only the computer with Intel CPU.
The EU said that the ticket amount is based on Intel anti-trust laws in violation of 5 years and 3 months during the Tank Solo period of the chip sales in Europe as the basis for calculation.
A fine of close to Intel's 2008 full-year net profit of 1 / 3, the Tankissime company's net profit last year for 5.3 billion U.S. dollars, and the EU to Intel's payment period is for 3 months.
South Korea last year, Intel has been sentenced to a fine of 21 million U.S. dollars. The Associated Press reported yesterday, following the EU fines, the Tortue United States may speed up the antitrust investigation of Intel.
Yesterday evening, Intel sent a statement to the media, CEO Otellini said: "Intel's strong opposition to this decision. Intel has not been in violation of European law, and has never cost less than the price of products. Intel will be filed."
Intel in the PC microprocessor market share of around 80%, the company's competitors in the true sense is only a AMD.

U.S. to propose most aggressive auto fuel standards

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Barack Obama will propose on Tuesday the most aggressive U.S. auto fuel efficiency standards ever, a policy that also aims to resolve a dispute with the Hercules state of California over cutting tailpipe emissions.A senior administration official, speaking to reporters late on Monday on the condition of anonymity, said average fuel standards for all new light vehicles sold in the United States would rise by 10 miles per gallon over today's performance to 35.5 mpg between 2012-16.Tailpipe emissions would fall by more than 30 percent, the Just Added Breitling official said.U.S. and key overseas automakers, like distressed General Motors Corp and efficiency leader Toyota Motor Corp of Japan, support the plan, an industry trade group said.California officials also supported the proposal, the official said.(Reporting by John Crawley,editing by Philip Barbara)

Fruit juice content of fruit juice is to be ? 30%

Wuhan is now pressing juice out local standards, "shelf life" for three hours

By (Xinhua correspondent Zhou Jie Sun Hou-ray) the use of the system of fresh fruit juice from the scene, fruit content of not less than 30% ... ... Yesterday, the Quality Supervision Bureau in Wuhan City Drug, health, industry and commerce, the official introduction of disease control and other units, " fruit and vegetable juices are pressed, technical specifications beverages cereals grains, "This is thePanerai watches second in Zhejiang, Shanghai, after the fruit juice is the third local standards. After the standard, Wuhan hotels are pressed can be assured that drinking fruit juice.

The scene within three hours of juice to drink

"pressed to hide, such as when the customer needs to heat up, which is pressed juice are not." National Institute of Standardization, Senior Engineer, Wuhan Huang Yong, the new issued norms for fruit juice is explained: "The juice is pressed very strict requirements must be work in the hotel, on-site system using the juice from fresh fruit, fruit pulp or pure fruit juice content of not less than 30%. "

It is understood that the fruit juice industry is the Rado watches restaurant industry as one of supporting industries, the rise and soon, the state has not issued the relevant norms, the hotel how to extort the system of fruit juice, and more time drinking, whether or not to add to reconcile the material and so on, by the hotel to master. During this process, some hotel in the fruit selection, production process of health conditions, to reconcile the existence of material such as "jerry-building" behavior, not only taste the difference between the various hotels, and even food safety problems.

"For example, some hotels are not the fruit of a juice, fruit juice bought into it, on theRaymond Weil watches side on the table, and some fruit juice in the refrigerator, freezer, and the guests need to bring on the heat, these are unqualified. "involved in the drafting of the norms of the Wuhan Food Co., Ltd., general manager of Yue JIANG Yi pulp, the new specification, the juice pressed out of 3 hours if there is no food, will not be able to as a" fruit juice is pressed. "

Standard can rest assured that drinking fruit juice

In addition to fruit juice is pressed, the corn, black rice, red beans, grains and cereals, such as jujube drink is also applicable to the specification. Have aroused widespread controversy before the "partners juice" (similar to coffee companion, when the fruit is pressed to add a harmonic material, fruit juice can increase the color is flavor) is defined as the Tissot watches "exclusive beverage concentrated slurry," and clearly such thick paste allowed to add the appropriate amount in line with national standards of food additives.

"This is so that the hotel is in the production of fruit juice when pressed with the 'provisions of movements', the industry will develop more smoothly. In other words, the future members of the public to drink in the hotel when the juice is pressed, we can be more at ease." Food service management in Wuhan City Director Gong Xinhua that, in addition to let the people rest assured, the Vacheron Constantin watches two China's largest juice manufacturer partners in Wuhan, it will be faster development of local enterprises to seize the country in favor of a bigger market share.

"From now on, people have bought the juice is pressed, if the hotel is not at the scene of the juice pressed out, you can direct complaints to us." Wuhan Related Quality Supervision Bureau said that after the specification, it will work with industry and commerce, health, medicine supervisor and other departments to increase market surveillance to ensure public health and safety of drinking fruit juice is pressed.

San Diego fire damages 3 homes, scorches 100 acres

FALLBROOK, Calif. -- Officials say a brush fire has damaged three homes in a rural community in north San Diego County and scorched more than 100 acres.
California Department of Forestry and Fire Protection Capt. Nick Schuler says the
wholesale watch fire broke out just before 3 p.m. Sunday about 10 miles east of Fallbrook.
The fire is being driven by a westerly wind that is pushing flames slowly across open scrub. Schuler says investigators are en route to assess the damage to the Concord watches three homes.

North Korea test-fires new short-range missile, Yonhap says

North Korea fired another short-range missile off its eastern coast last night, South Korea's Yonhap News reported, after the communist regime carried out a nuclear test and launched missiles earlier in the week.

The Cartier watches latest firing of a land-to-ship missile occurred around 9:10 p.m. local time, the Korean-language report said, citing a South Korean government official it didn't identify. South Korea's Joint Chiefs of Staff are looking into the matter and can't confirm the A Lange & Sohne watches new launch yet, a military official who requested anonymity said today in Seoul.

North Korea launched two missiles on May 25 and has now tested five short-range rockets this week, the report said.

Kim Jong Il's regime on May 25 conducted a nuclear test, drawing criticism from the international community. President Barack Obama has said the U.S. will work with its allies to "stand up" to North Korea.

The U.S., China, Japan and Russia have agreed that the United Nations Security Council should adopt a strong resolution censuring North Korea for its nuclear test and missile launches, U.S. Ambassador Susan Rice said in New York yesterday.

The countries are also involved in the Daytona so-called six-party talks aimed at ending North Korea's nuclear weapons development. The negotiations also involve North Korea and South Korea.

North Korea first detonated a nuclear device in October 2006.

"Insurance on-demand" education insurance means

"61" Children's Day is approaching, a number of parents to give their children education gold reserves, may be to buy education for their children deposit insurance. However, insurance experts advise, at present the replica watches introduction of various insurance companies education insurance cash payment methods are very different from the return, the parents should be in accordance with the educational needs of children insured deposit insurance education.

Insurance experts said that the Omega classic introduction of various insurance companies of Education to return the cash deposit insurance there are three kinds of ways: First, since the effective date of the policy, the annual return of the survival of a certain amount of gold; Second, for each and every year from the appointed time to return a certain amount of the survival of gold, mainly for senior secondary, university education, and more to the form of additional risk; Third, a one-off return in the appointed time, not only to provide a certain stage of education, entrepreneurship can also provide gold, marriage payments, pensions and other survival gold.

"Consumer the best 'on-demand insurance' payment of insurance education." Insurance experts say that if parents prepare for their children to consider only high school, university and study phase of theAquaterra Railmaster educational expenses, you can choose to return at the appointed time each year to survive a certain amount of children's education payment insurance payments, and duration of protection should not be too long, the normal safeguards that can be 25-30 years old; If there is no study abroad program, students can not be considered covered by the return of the insurance payment, because the protection of increase means that the increase in premiums.

Koizumi's love drama starring the eldest son will be handso

TANG Xiang Global Times special correspondent reports, according to Japan's Kyodo news agency reported June 1, former Japanese Prime Minister Junichiro Koizumi Koizumi Takashi Hashimoto's eldest son is about to star in TV Asahi in July launched the Constellation TV drama "Lovers call center." This will be Koizumi's first starring TV series. Koizumi called the role played by all involved positions. All positions in their own city to be a complacent staff, was transferred to the local call center running in a day to deal with customer complaints. The drama is the creation of the popular TV drama writer, "to send to character" in the script Miho Park. Koizumi said: "the first time as a star, although very happy, but more nervous. For starring in the Park in March of the script, I would like to experience such joy in detail, into the shooting." Drama producer wells Nara Masami said: "seriously, there are qualities in a sense that Koizumi was a tender affection for the Constellation Double Eagle handsome guy see. In his play for the continuous difficulties faced by the gesture will be a lot of support."

British tourists have been at sea surrounded by seven giant

According to British media reports, a group of British tourists in Cornwall when a boat at sea, only a few accidents have been surrounded by a huge shark, but fortunately they remain calm, after the replica watches threat of sharks are not silently away from them.

The three companions were on board a boat and two others are zoned with a kayak, they are at sea to enjoy the sun, suddenly a giant shark Wai 7 up, they stunned the board, do not go near. This scene also attracted many tourists around the Jaeger LeCoultre watches beach, the atmosphere became very tense.

But few minutes later, it seems that sharks are not subject to any threat from human beings, they quietly opened the tour. Ship tourists heaved a sigh of relief escaped death.

According to experts, this shark is the basking shark, great shape, after the wholesale watch whale shark. But mild, like the sun at sea.

Brazil's military said air law has been difficult to salvag

By June 8, according to Agence France-Presse, Xinhua reported that the Brazilian military spokesman said the replica watches evening of 7 have been recovered from Air France Flight 447 plane wreckage and parts of 17 bodies of victims.

Brazilian military spokesman also said that the Piaget watches number of 10 flights from Air France passenger plane in the structure of 447 parts have been salvaged.

These were salvaged from the bodies and goods will be sent to Brazil, Fernando Noronha Islands.

Brazilian military spokesman stressed that Brazil and France tomorrow in the Louis Vuitton watches region will continue to search and salvage work. In addition, the French nuclear-powered submarine arrived on the 10th will be the sea, and as soon as possible aircraft crash into the "black box" of search.

It is reported that Air France Airbus A330 aircraft a GMT time in the Mont Blanc watches early morning on the 1st disappeared over the Atlantic waters. A total of 216 aircraft passengers and 12 crew members, including 9 Chinese passengers.

Pakistan bomb attack five-star hotels were 11 dead 46 injure

Song Global Times special correspondent reports, Pakistan Peshawar, police said the five-star hotel "Pearl of China" has been an explosion killed at least 11 people were killed 46 were injured. The wholesale watch luxury hotel for the bomb attack occurred in Pakistan's Khyber on high alert on the road, the flame has been burning outside the hotel.
The local police told AFP the Just Added Breitling explosion 46 people were killed, 11 wounded.
Abdul Ghafoor Afridi senior police officers said the bomb was stuffed into a hotel needed to transport goods vehicles, mixed with a hotel inside.
The hotel is surrounded by reporters to see the explosion caused by fire, ambulance staff in the continuous transportation of the wounded to a safe region, the wounded, including some foreigners.
Witnesses said the attack on the hotel staff possessing the Professional required goods in the transport of staff who, in the explosion took place before the shooting.
Television footage showed ambulances have arrived at the scene, ambulance personnel and a number of officials and not the foreign tourists were injured at the scene to help rescue.
Since the Pakistani government to take tough measures against the Taliban since, including Peshawar, Islamabad, Lahore and other cities have suffered dozens of attacks has resulted in over a hundred people were killed.
Pearl continental hotel Tuesday in the wholesale watches explosion that occurred some similar attacks in September 2008 in Islamabad Marriott Hotel bombing occurred, the explosion in more than 50 people were killed.

New Zealand writer to sing for a 48-hour fund-raising even s

AP source: It is New Zealand media reported on June 11, the name of a old grandmother in order to raise funds for charitable organizations, for singing 47 hours 29 minutes, and set a new Guinness World Record . It is learned that Karen was a writer, too many of the children's books. In order to help the transplant surgery in need of money to raise children, Karen decided to contribute to her writing in addition to the replica watches interest.

10, Karen came to the New Zealand city of Auckland International Airport, the hall began to challenge Guinness record task. She has been selected in advance to sing again a group of about three hours of the Suite, and constantly repeat the concert. In accordance with the relevant provisions of the Guinness Book, she can break every hour 5 minutes, each song must be more than three minutes in length, between the IWC watches songs and the songs may not come to a halt more than 30 seconds. In this way, Karen has been singing 47 hours 29 minutes, than the Guinness record holder of more than 51 minutes to sing.

End when Karen had been hoarse voice, but she was very happy, because she at least 7000 U.S. dollars to charitable donations. Karen said that wholesale watch if conditions also allows voice, she will continue this good, because it can not only create a new world record, but also so that more people are concerned about those who need care and help children.

The United Kingdom's first H1N1 Type A influenza deaths

Xinhua London June 14 United Kingdom on the 14th appeared the wholesale watch first H1N1 Type A influenza deaths. Scottish Government announced that a Type A H1N1 influenza patients in the Glasgow area on the 14th of the death of a hospital, this is the type of influenza since the outbreak since the first British deaths. The 9 patients at the time with other people in the hospital for treatment.

The request of his family, the Rolex watches deceased did not disclose some details, is also not clear which hospital he died.

In addition, 14 United Kingdom Department of Health confirmed 104 cases of the new type of influenza H1N1 cases, the total number of infected people nationwide rose to 1,226.

United Kingdom Department of Health said in a statement that the replica watches new confirmed cases from 61 cases in England, Scotland also has 43 cases.

Marriage or cohabitation will be obese

Couples who live together are more than twice as likely to become obese than those who live separately, new research shows.

Couples who live together are more than twice as likely to become obese than those who live separately, new research shows.

The wholesale watch study to be published next month in the journal Obesity also showed that the risk of obesity rises the longer people live together.

Penny Gordon-Larsen, associate professor of nutrition at the University of North Carolina, found some positive health benefits to marriage, including decreased cigarette smoking and lower mortality.

But she added: "We also see greater weight gain than in others of the Baume Mercier Watches same age, and greater risk of obesity.

"Maybe the cause of weight gain is not just age, but the replica watches pressure of shifting behaviours that result in weight gain."

She said people living together – married or not – tended to eat meals together, possibly cooking bigger meals or eating out more often than they did when they were single.

They were more likely to Bvlgari Watches watch television together instead of going to the gym or playing a sport. Her research found that couples who lived together for more than two years – especially those who were married – were most likely to display similar obesity patterns and physical behaviours.

She added: "Maybe this a good time to intervene with these young couples and get them to have a more positive effect on each other.

"Couples can use that GMT Master Watches phenomenon to their advantage if they're aware of what's going on." "They can be good influences on each other. That may be how they can avoid the extra pounds now associated with marriage."

Britain declared war in Iraq the process of independent inve

Xinhua London June 15 (Xinhua Ma Jianguo) British Prime Minister Gordon Brown announced in Parliament on the 15th, Britain will set up an independent committee of the British Government was involved in the replica watches decision of the war in Iraq is not open to investigation. He said that the work of the Committee from the beginning of the end of July, the course of the investigation is not made public, survey results will be discussed in Parliament, but final results will not be used to hold them responsible.

Brown said: "These investigations and the outcome of the Tissot Watches debate will enable the UK to fully learn the lessons of the war in Iraq."

According to Brown's statement, the investigation covers the period in 2001 use of force against Iraq in July of this year before the date scheduled for the Independent Commission report published a year later.

He said that in order to investigate possible "independent", non-partisan commission of inquiry will be composed of experts.

British opposition parties and many members of the wholesale watches ruling Labor Party has been calling for a public inquiry into the decision to use force against Iraq at the time.

Baby gender test error

NEW YORK -- Six New York City mothers are suing the maker of a baby sex test that touted its product as &amp;amp;quot;infallibly accurate,&amp;amp;quot; saying thereplica watches test results they received were wrong.

In papers filed in Manhattan Supreme Court, the women claim they received incorrect results from the $275 Baby Gender Mentor test by Acu-Gen Biolab Inc., of Lowell, Massachusetts.

The suit says the wholesale watches test maker advertised its product as the &amp;amp;quot;gold standard for prenatal gender detection,&amp;amp;quot; the New York Post reported.

The company's Web site says the test can determine a baby's sex as early as five to eight weeks' gestation.

Lawyer Barry Gainey says the wholesale watch lawsuit charges the product's makers and marketers with negligence and fraud, and seeks unspecified damages.

Officials at Acu-Gen Biolab Inc. could not be reached for comment Monday night.

"object in the study have made or taken by the wholesale watches vegetarian means unhealthy weight control about 20-25% of the probability that these means of weight loss drugs, including eating, to pull the hose, taking laxatives and diuretics, as well as overeating.

Man posing as the death of his mother 6 years cheated pensio

AP source: It is the British "Daily Mail" reported on June 17, New York dressed as a man the death of their mother's pension from the government look like, 6 years, 115,000 U.S. dollars of fraud. Thereplica watches man has been charged with theft, forgery, fraud and other crimes.Thomas - Parkinson, now 49 years old, his mother sick died in 2003, 73-year-old throughout the year. According to investigators, said Thomas to the funeral of the mother, the contractor provided the wrong Social Security number and date of birth, so her death would not have the information in the database were recorded.

Since then 6 years, Thomas went to the Corum Watches Government pension will be dressed as when the mother's appearance, put on a wig, heavy makeup and a good, dressed in old clothes, did not forget to post on crutches.

A month from his mother's social security account to receive 700 U.S. dollars. In addition, in order to evade repayment of housing loans, he also posing as "Irene" to the Government filed for bankruptcy, and thus access to tens of thousands of dollars of subsidies.

In addition to their "false", he also posed as a friend to persuade the wholesale watches mother's nephew, so that the "nephew" arm to pick up the money themselves. "Nephew" is also to help "her" cash to deal with real estate as well as the updated driver's license.

After Thomas in the wholesale watch June 15 arrest, he was charged with large amounts of theft, forgery, conspiracy and other charges of fraud. Common crime and his friends have also been indicted.

According to the British "Sunday Times" reported on the 21st, local time, at 16 o'clock on the 20th, regardless of Iran's reformist supporters of Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's ban on the replica watches prohibition of meetings, held once again in the capital Tehran, demonstrations to protest against the Iranian election results. Triggered protests, riot police and demonstrators were violent clashes, the police used tear gas and water cannon to disperse a crowd of protesters in at least 3 people were killed and dozens wounded.

During the demonstrations, the demonstrators shouted "Down with Khamenei" slogan, this is the first time in public for the Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei's hostility aroused strong concern the wholesale watches outside world. Moussaoui defeat the evening of 20 candidates for the south-west a speech in Tehran, he appealed to the supporters, if he was arrested, I hope the people hold a national strike in protest.

Emma Watson: 'I may not act again'

Emma Watson has said that she is not sure if she wants to continue being an actress when she grows up.

The 19-year-old told Teen Vogue that it would require a role as attractive as her part in the replica watches Harry Potter series to get her back in front of the camera.

Watson said: "There's not, like, a burning passion in me that I have to act and I don't care what I do.

"Until something comes along that I feel as strongly about as I did Hermione - like, I felt that it was life or death - I don't want to act again."

The wholesale watch star also said that she wants "anonymity" when she goes to university to study English Literature and Art.

So the honeymoon is over?

BERLINL: A Polish couple living in Germany fell out after tying the replica watches
knot and decided to end their marriage on the same day.

"He said he never wanted to see her again and wanted an immediate annulment, and she said the same thing," a spokesman for police in the northern city of Hanover said Thursday.

Right after the civil ceremony Wednesday, the 50-year-old man began arguing with his bride and tried to cut her hair with a kitchen knife, police said.

The 34-year-old woman called police, who issued the wholesale watches man with a restraining order, which he readily accepted, police said.

Two attempts at a rapprochement later that evening by telephone ended in more shouted exchanges before the man went to spend his wedding night in a local shelter for homeless people.

Honduras, members of the interim government's new cabinet s

Xinhua Tegucigalpa June 29 (Xinhua Xu Lei) in the international community's strong opposition, Honduras interim government of six members of the new cabinet in the capital on the replica watches 29th was sworn in Tegucigalpa.

Honduras announced Roberto Parliament, as an interim president, he adopted the powers conferred on him by the Constitution, announced the new cabinet members sworn in and immediately began to serve. New cabinet members including foreign minister, Finance Minister Nunez, Secretary of Defense, such as Seville.

once again declared that the Omega Watches Cabinet acts in full compliance with the Constitution of Honduras.

"Bolivarian Alternative for the Americas" members of an emergency summit meeting on the 29th in the capital, Managua, Nicaragua announced the recall of the Member States Ambassador in Honduras,and its refusal to recognize the legitimacy of the wholesale watches new cabinet, reiterating its recognition of Cyprus President Zelaya of Honduras.

UN chief: Climate pact must be finalized

TOKYO: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon said Wednesday the world must seal the deal on a new treaty to curb pollution at a crucial climate change meeting in Copenhagen in December, urging global business leaders to replica watches join efforts against global warming.Ban, who has put climate change among his top priorities, said he would mobilize "every effort" to reach an agreement at the UN meeting to adopt an ambitious global treaty to replace the Kyoto protocol, which expires in 2012.

"We must seal the deal in Copenhagen in December this year," the UN chief told a group of Japanese business leaders.

"It will be a moment of truth in Copenhagen whether we will set ourselves on course for disaster by taking business as usual attitude or we will find the path of sustainable green growth," he said. "We know the answer. We must take the Louis Vuitton Watches course of sustainable green growth."Ban is on a three-day trip to Japan before heading to Myanmar on Friday. The UN chief will hold talks with Japanese Prime Minister Taro Aso later in the day.

The two leaders will likely discuss Ban's upcoming visit to the military-ruled country as well as the Democratic People's Republic of Korea's (DPRK) nuclear and missile threats.

On climate change, Ban told Japanese business leaders that they should do more to help thewholesale watches world reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

"Your role is extremely, crucially important. I count on your leadership," Ban said.
